title: Instrument Pointing
$comment: Providers should $ref this schema directly but Attitudes.schema.json instead.

ra.description: RA pointing of the instrument Z axis

dec.description: Dec pointing of the instrument Z axis

roll.description: Roll of the instrument about its Z axis

rotation_x.description: Rotational rate about the X axis

rotation_y.description: Rotational rate [rad/s] about the Y axis

rotation_z.description: Rotational rate [rad/s] about the Z axis

time.description: Time [UTC, ISO 8601] of this data, if different than the trigger time.
